text: Þis syndan þa landgemære into Tængtune.
Þæt is ærest of þam readan clife on ælfredes denn.
And of þam denne on þone haran stan.
And of þam stane on Mægnhilde beorh.
And of þam beorge on riscwille.
And of þære wylle on þa ruga ðyrna.
And of þara ðyrne on þon holan broch.
And of þam broche on hæselford.
And of þam forde andlangc weges on þone stapel.
And of þam stapele on dryge pytt.
And of þam pytte on fulla wille.
And of þære wylle on cobbanhyll.
And of þære hylle on cobbanbroc.
And of þam broche andlang streames inne wenric.
And swa to þam readan clyfe.
Þis is þæt gemære to þam more þe þider innto ligð.
Þæt is of diclace a wilstede.
And of wilstede on ryðera ford.
And of þam forde on wireneges þorn.
And of þam þorne andlang wenric on beafolces ears.
And of beafolces earse andlang Temese be healfan streame eft inne diclace.
Þis is þæt gemære to þam wuda þider inn.
Þæt is ærest of friðeles stane on þone stanian weigg.
And of þam wege on fæste graf.
And of þam grafe andlang weges on wiðilea.
And of þære lea swa eft on þone stan.
